item.description:
Our selection for the evening will be The Gods Themselves by Isaac Asimov. Tied for first with our February pick, with many close behind.


Comments provided by: http://www.powells.co...

Publisher Comments:
Only a few know the terrifying truth--an outcast Earth scientist, a rebellious alien inhabitant of a dying planet, a lunar-born human intuitionist who senses the imminent annihilation of the Sun. They know the truth--but who will listen? They have foreseen the cost of abundant energy--but who will believe? These few beings, human and alien, hold the key to the Earth's survival.

We're heading back to the Harvest coffee shop (facing Mass ave). Sorry for the late notice! Email me with questions!
item.name: Cambridge Meet-Up: The Gods Themselves by Isaac Asimov
